channel.title: funding on Collaborations Workshop Ideas & Pitches
channel.description: Recent content in funding on Collaborations Workshop Ideas & Pitches

item.title: How to encourage and ensure software maintenance gets sufficiently funded
item.description: CW21 - 2021-03-30 Bagpuss - CI2-CW21 Participants Sorrel Harriet (Chair) Teri Forey (Scribe) Diego Alonso Álvarez Heather Turner Alexander Konovalov Ilian Todorov This document should be used to capture the information for a Collaborative Session / Hack Day Idea. (The total amount of text should ideally be between 100-300 words and you can include a diagram or two). The document should be no larger than two pages of A4. Don’t delete the details at the top of the document but you should delete all of this hint text (Arial, italic, grey, size 11) once you no longer need it.

item.title: Tools to recognise underlying software infrastructure visible and funded
item.description: CW21 Hack Day - 2021-03-31 to 2021-04-01 Hermann-1926 - HP11-CW21 Hack Day idea proposer **Louise Chisholm ** This document should be used to capture the information for a Hack Day Idea. Idea name (provisional) This is the provisional name of the Idea, solution or just a title; this can be changed later if a team is formed and you decide on a new team/product name. Tools to recognise underlying software infrastructure visible & funded
